forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny, with a high near 39. West wind 8 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 29. Southwest wind around 7 mph.

weather_report:
As the day unfolds in Boston, the sky reveals its grace, draped in a quilt of soft clouds that signal a mostly sunny condition, intertwined with the chill that whispers of winter’s embrace. The high temperature is poised to barely touch the brisk forties, stirred gently by a west wind, which carries a promise of vitality, but also a brisk bite. Evening will herald a subtle shift—the clouds parting to allow the stars a sliver of space, ushering in a cool night where the mercury dips into the high twenties.

While the day beckons with a blend of clarity and movement, it is crucial to be mindful of attire. Layering becomes not just practical but a comfort against the chill; a sturdy coat, perhaps a scarf to ward off the cool breeze, along with some knit gloves will do well to wrap you in warmth. Given the day’s character, one might find pleasure in a brisk stroll along the Charles, encountering the hushed vibrancy of a city alive with understated energy. 

The afternoon sun will cast shadows that dance and play upon the sidewalks, inviting the curious to explore cozy cafes or perhaps indulge in a quiet moment at a bookstore, where the scent of coffee blends sweetly with that of bound pages. Such simple pleasures are the essence of a day where life moves at a gentle pace, urging one to pause and savor.
